title: Team Page Access
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is Team Tab with JSON configured for at least one module to have webViewUrl = "ballpark://putmeinthepark"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User clicks the configured item for put me in the park
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Put Me in Park landing page is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User clicks the back arrow in Toolbar and does not have a fav team
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Team Tab is displayed for team where PMITP link was clicked

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User clicks system back key and does not have a fav team
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Team Tab is displayed for team where PMITP link was clicked

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User clicks the back arrow in Toolbar and does have a fav team
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Team Tab is displayed for team where PMITP link was clicked

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User clicks system back key and have a fav team
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Team Tab is displayed for team where PMITP link was clicked

title: Deep Link Access
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User has deep link which contains "ballpark://putmeinthepark?venueID={venueId}&teamID={teamId}" 

NOTE: Use a link where venue = 19 and team = 115 for Rockies in Slack Message or in Email on Phone

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on deep link and does not have a favorite team
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Put Me in Park landing page is displayed with proper venue and team (primary color and specific text is correct)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on back button in upper tool bar
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Team Tab is displayed with team that was associated with deep link

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on system back button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Team Tab is displayed with team that was associated with deep link

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on deep link and has a favorite team which is not the deep link team
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Put Me in Park landing page is displayed with proper venue and team (primary color and specific text is correct)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on back button in upper tool bar
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Team Tab is displayed with team that was associated with deep link

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on system back button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Team Tab is displayed with team that was associated with deep link

title: Page Layout
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on Put Me In Park Page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN page is displayed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Toolbar title will be the name of the venue

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN page is displayed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN title will be 'Put Me in [venueName]' displayed in team's primary color

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN page is displayed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the following description text will be displayed below the title:
Take me out the ballgame, put me into the crowd!

THEN the following text will be displayed below the title with proper club name and venue name:
"Select a photo of yourself and take a seat at [venueName]. So go ahead, put on your lucky hat or favorite jersey, send us a photo and support the [clubNickName] at all their games at [venueName]."

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN page is displayed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN there will be an animated gif below description text showing sample photos with cut out lines

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN page is displayed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN there will be a header called "Photo Tips"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN page is displayed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN there will be a bulleted list displayed below photo tips header as follows:

* Make sure you have your whole body from the waist up in the frame.
* For best results use the rear facing camera.
* Solid dark backgrounds work best for the printing process.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN page is displayed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN there will be an image displayed below bulleted list which show do's and don'ts

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN page is displayed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user can scroll up and down to view entire page contents

title: Floating Upload Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on Put Me In Park Page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN page is displayed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN there is a floating button which is always visible as user scrolls the page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN page is displayed which includes floating button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN floating button's background is displayed in team's primary color

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN page is displayed which includes floating button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Text displayed in floating button is "Select a Photo"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN page is displayed
custom_steps_separated.expected: WHEN user clicks on floating button, a dialog to choose an image is displayed

title: Choosing Image
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on Put In Park Page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User clicks add photo button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a dialog is displayed which has options to either use camera or view photo library or cancel

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User selects camera option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN native camera is launched, able to take photo

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User selects photo library
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN photo library displayed with photo picker with ability to select only one image

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User selects cancel
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN dialog is dismissed and returned to landing page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User hits back button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN dialog is dismissed and returned to landing page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User selects image from photo library
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Photo is displayed in edit screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User takes photo using camera
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Photo is displayed in edit screen

title: Photo Editing
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has chose to use an photo from either photo library or taken picture with camera

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user completes photo selection
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Selected photo is displayed in edit mode screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Selected photo is displayed in edit mode screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN text appears at top of screen that says "Center yourself in outline" along with a "Redo" button and a "Submit Photo" button at bottom of screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Selected photo is displayed in edit mode screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN silhouette outline on photo is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Selected photo is displayed in edit mode screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User can pan to get proper fit

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Selected photo is displayed in edit mode screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User can zoom to get proper fit

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User hits back button in edit mode screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User is returned to landing page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User clicks on redo button on edit screen for selected camera image
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is returned to camera to take another photo

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User clicks redo button on edit screen for selected library image
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is returned to library to select another photo

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User clicks on submit photo button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Photo Submission Dialog is displayed

title: Submitting Photo Dialog
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has completed editing selected photo

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User clicks on submit button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Dialog is displayed with title "Submit Photo", text "This photo will be used for your cut-out upon submission."

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User clicks on submit photo button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Dialog is displayed with two options - "Cancel" or "Submit"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User selects cancel option from dialog
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User is returned to photo edit screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User selects submit option from dialog
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Submission of the photo is initiated and dialog is dismissed

title: Photo Submission
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has completed edits of selected image

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User clicks on submit in dialog
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Loading indicator is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User clicks on submit in dialog
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Upload of raw photo using services is initiated

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User clicks on submit in dialog
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Upload of cropped centered photo using services is initiated

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Upload of both images is successful
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User is navigated to a webview URL based on club selected team ID along with the required query parameters in the format shown in attached image![](index.php?/attachments/get/1842565)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Upload of either image fails
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Dialog is displayed “Something went wrong uploading your photo. Please try again.” With option to “Retry”

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Upload of either image fails and retry option is selected
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Upload of both images using services is initiated

title: Photo Upload Service
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has edited an image

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User has requested image to be submitted
WHEN User has requested image to be submitted and service call times out
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Error dialog is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User has requested image tobe submitted and service call fails
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Error dialog is displayed

title: WebView Page Display
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has successfully uploaded images

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Photos submission service call completes
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN User is taken to webview URL where the URL is built using values returned from submission service call. The WebviewURL is built using format shown here:
![](index.php?/attachments/get/1842566)

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Team Tab is displayed with team that was associated with deep link

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Team Tab is displayed with team that was associated with deep link

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Team Tab is displayed with team that was associated with deep link

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on system back button after launching via deep link and has fav team
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Team Tab is displayed with team that was associated with deep link

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Team Tab with item that was clicked to initiate PMITP is displayed

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Team Tab with item that was clicked to initiate PMITP is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on system back button after launching via team page and does have fav team
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Team Tab with item that was clicked to initiate PMITP is displayed

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Team Tab with item that was clicked to initiate PMITP is displayed
